title: temporary blip or permanent loss
body: I feel like the transition to boards has damaged community contributions. Temporary blip or have folks buggered off for good?

replies.body: some have left some for good. which is good and bad, because some of them needed to leave permanently.
Oh yeah? Interesting. ... who has buggered off for good?

> some have left some for good. which is good and bad, because some of them needed to leave permanently.

I agree, when will you be leaving?
Its like all things, people dont like change, its like all the people who hate on the new SR, say in 2 years if riot changes it back to the old one, those same people will complain again.
